pr_title: refactor(android): represent permission states using enum

timeline.message: removing requestCode, permissions, grantResults from onRequestPermissionsResult and providing states
Replace internal use of JSObject with Map
new PermissionState enum to represent the permission states possible

timeline.body: We should probably rephrase this to talk about the "alias"
timeline.bodyText: We should probably rephrase this to talk about the "alias"
timeline.bodyHTML: We should probably rephrase this to talk about the "alias"
timeline.author: imhoffd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -364,9 +363,9 @@ public void pluginRequestPermission(String permission, int requestCode) {
      * Helper to check all permissions defined on a plugin and see the state of each.
      *
      * @since 3.0.0
-     * @return an object containing the permission names and the permission result
+     * @return an map containing the permission names and the permission state

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
refactor(android): Revert "represent permission states using enum" (#3988)
feat(android): switch to new callback-style permission requests (#4033)
refactor(android): remove status parameter from plugin callbacks (#4060)
feat(android): method to check permission for an alias (#4062)
refactor(android): fix error msg and comments related to permission callback #4063
fix(android): requestPermission call rejects if permission missing in manifest
feat(android): activity result use new API and update permission result callbacks to match (#4127)
refactor(android): permission API cleanup (#4171)
feat(android): Unifying saving plugin calls (#4254)
fix(android): calls re-saved during permission/activity result callbacks were being released
fix(android): Release the call after reject/resolve (#4318)
fix(android): resolve issue with activity result API registration for fragments (#4402)
fix(android): save activity result launcher calls (#5004)
fix(android): Avoid ConcurrentModificationException on notifyListeners (#5125)
fix(android): make removeAllListeners return a promise (#5527)
chore: Silence NativePlugin deprecation warnings (#5625)
fix(android): handle empty permission list (#6375)

timeline.body:
Do we want to call the plugin instance version?

```suggestion
                        plugin.getInstance().onRequestPermissionsResult(savedPermissionCall, plugin.getInstance().getPermissionStates());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Do we want to call the plugin instance version?

Suggested change
plugin.getInstance().onRequestPermissionsResult(savedPermissionCall, getPermissionStates(plugin.getInstance()));
plugin.getInstance().onRequestPermissionsResult(savedPermissionCall, plugin.getInstance().getPermissionStates());
timeline.author: imhoffd
